content:
Future Work

  • Genetic algorithms and simulated annealing

  • Costs that depend on factors other than the actual class and the predicted class

    • e.g., distance from maintenance facility
    • classification of other examples

  • Combining with cost of making tests

  • Other Test Selection Metrics

  • Discovering Attribute Dependencies in Bayesian Classifiers
